name: HomestarRunner.com Minor Characters Quiz / Test | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: We have heard, but not seen, a certain character once.  He leaves a message on Marzipan's answering machine inviting her to his house.  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Kevin has a normal voice, unlike other characters.  This is his only appearance, in the 6th answering machine file.

questions.text: In the second "Teen Girls Squad", what is the name of the alien-looking character who hits What's Her Face with a bat?
questions.explanation:
Thomas.

	When a male character asks "What happened to her?", So And So replies "She got hurt", but the word bubble says "Thomas hit her with a bat."

questions.text: The King of Town has a guard who has a flag on his head.  What is the flag?
questions.explanation:
American Flag.

	This guard has a one-piece suit of armor that resembles a tall, thin helmet.  He has no arms that we can see.

questions.text: The King of Town has a trumpeter who also rides the unicycle.  What color is the trumpeter's skin?
questions.explanation:
White.

	He is seen riding a unicycle in "The House that Gave Sucky Treats".

questions.text: There is an unnamed character with a long neck, a handlebar moustache, and a monacle.  Which of these cartoons has he not appeared in?
questions.explanation:
A Jorb Well Done.

	In "The Ballad of the Sneak" there are actually three of him, and they sing the song.  In the other two he acts as an announcer and judge for the contests.  "Marshmallow's Last Stand" is an early cartoon that has now sadly been removed from the site.

questions.text: There is a file called "The Cards" that has been deleted from the site but can be found on several fan sites.  It contained pictures of each character with their names underneath them that you could scroll through.  It wasn't very remarkable.  However, there were two cards portraying characters that have not had any substantial roles in any of the cartoons on the site.  One of the cards showed the Unguraits, small green creatures with red eyes.  How many Unguraits were pictured?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	It is likely that the Chapman brothers created these characters but never had a chance to put them in a cartoon.

questions.text: Aside from the Unguraits, there is one other character pictured in "The Cards" who has never had any major roles.  Name him.
questions.explanation:
Homeschool Winner.

	Several theories have been proposed about Homeschool Winner and the Unguraits, with no way of proving them aside from asking the Chapman Brothers.  Homeschool Winner also appears in one of the backgrounds in the "Dancing Bubs" game.

questions.text: Which of these cartoons has the Robot not appeared in?
questions.explanation:
Where is the Cheat?.

	Strong Bad told a story about the Robot in "A Homestarloween Party".  In "Teen Girl Squad", he killed one of the girls.  He also appeared in Strong Bad's music video "Everybody to the Limit".

questions.text: Who is not a member of the Teen Girl Squad?
questions.explanation:
The Other One.

	The missing teen girl is The Ugly One.

questions.text: What is the name of the Fluffypuff Marshmallow company's mascot?
questions.explanation:
Marshie & Marshy.

	Homestar is a huge supporter of Fluffypuff Marshmallows, and he even in some commercials for them.
